fields.description: RunInstances api call needs to support multiple 'ephemeral' device mappings. This works in AWS but fails in eucalyptus with the following: {code} 2013-05-22 12:28:15,384 foo [DEBUG]:Method: POST 2013-05-22 12:28:15,384 foo [DEBUG]:Path: /services/Eucalyptus/ 2013-05-22 fields.summary: RunInstances api call needs to support multiple 'ephemeral' device mappings

comments.body: I have attached a testcase the reproduces the issue as test_bdm1.py
This will need VMType changes as well as changes in how we manage disk space overall.

[~dmitrii]/[~tjcramer], I ran into this as well while doing a block device mapping comparison between Eucalyptus and AWS. What I find interesting is that we accept the block device mapping call in RunInstanceType. The VM types in 3.4.x were updated, however did block device mappings for instance store-backed instances not get addressed? Testing below: _Eucalyptus_ {code} $ euca-run-instances -k account2-user13 -t m1.medium --region account2-user13@ --user-data-file cloud-init.config emi-4EFE3A91 --block-device-mapping=/dev/sdc=ephemeral0 --debug 2014-01-24 14:20:11,297 DEBUG RunInstances parsed arguments: {'user_data': None, 'iam_profile': None, 'Placement.GroupName': None, 'shell_configfile': '', 'EbsOptimized': None, 'RamdiskId': None, 'subnet': None, 'group': [], 'key_id': None, 'Monitoring.Enabled': None, 'ImageId': 'emi-4EFE3A91', 'KeyName': 'account2-user13', 'deprecated_key_id': None, 'ClientToken': None, 'user_data_file': 'cloud-init.config', 'InstanceType': 'm1.medium', 'AddressingType': None, 'BlockDeviceMapping': [{'DeviceName': '/dev/sdc', 'VirtualName': 'ephemeral0'}], 'user_data_force': None, 'InstanceInitiatedShutdownBehavior': None, 'NetworkInterface': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'secondary_private_ip_address': None, 'KernelId': None, 'count': '1', 'userregion': 'account2-user13@', 'url': None, 'Placement.Tenancy': None, 'Placement.AvailabilityZone': None, 'private_ip_address': None, 'secondary_private_ip_address_count': None, 'secret_key': None, 'DisableApiTermination': None} 2014-01-24 14:20:11,297 DEBUG Config current user set to 'account2-user13' 2014-01-24 14:20:11,297 DEBUG
